task_definition_name: Refactor pull-all.sh Script On Mifos I/O
description: Refactor the pull-all.sh script to eliminate boilerplate code. The pull-all.sh script is used to pull updates from different microservice repositories on Mifos I/O. The logic should persist while script should work properly, be concise and tested to work on at least TWO OS types within this group { Linux, Mac, Windows}.
